title: Full Stack Web Development
description: Master HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and MongoDB to become a full stack developer.

reviews.name: Priya Sharma
reviews.comment: Excellent course! The hands-on projects really helped me understand full stack development.

reviews.name: Amit Patel
reviews.comment: Great instructors and content, though MongoDB section could use more examples.

title: Data Structures & Algorithms
description: Understand core computer science concepts and prepare for technical interviews.

reviews.name: Rahul Verma
reviews.comment: Very helpful for interview prep, the algorithm section was a game-changer.

reviews.name: Sneha Kapoor
reviews.comment: Good course, but could include more coding challenges.

title: UI/UX Design Bootcamp
description: Learn modern design principles and tools like Figma to create stunning interfaces.

reviews.name: Anjali Singh
reviews.comment: Loved the Figma tutorials, highly recommend for beginners!

reviews.name: Kunal Desai
reviews.comment: Great course, but the usability testing part was a bit rushed.

title: Python for Beginners
description: Start coding with Python, the most beginner-friendly language in tech.

reviews.name: Neha Gupta
reviews.comment: Perfect for beginners, the projects were very engaging.

reviews.name: Vikram Rao
reviews.comment: Clear explanations, but more exercises would be better.

title: Machine Learning Essentials
description: Build and train models using Python libraries like scikit-learn and TensorFlow.

reviews.name: Arjun Mehta
reviews.comment: In-depth content, TensorFlow section was outstanding!

reviews.name: Priyanka Nair
reviews.comment: Very comprehensive, though the pace was a bit fast.
